Based on the search results, I found some relevant information about young artists, magical realism, and contemporary interpretations of "One Hundred Years of Solitude." Let me provide you with a summary of what I found:

## Young Artists and Visual Interpretations of "One Hundred Years of Solitude" and Magical Realism

The search reveals several interesting trends in how young artists are engaging with Gabriel García Márquez's "One Hundred Years of Solitude" and magical realism aesthetics in 2024:

### TikTok and Social Media Presence

Several TikTok creators are exploring magical realism themes from "One Hundred Years of Solitude," including content from users like @alyona.nana, @panic_kyle, and @tomesandtextiles. Colombian media outlets are noting García Márquez's presence across social platforms including TikTok and Instagram.

### Contemporary Magical Realism in Visual Arts (2024)

Magical realism continues to thrive as "a vibrant and stirring direction in today's art scene," with contemporary artists adapting its principles to new realities and technologies. Artists like Artem Skripnikov are creating works that capture "the essence of magical realism, reminiscent of the timeless narrative style found in Gabriel García Márquez's 'One Hundred Years of Solitude'".

### 2024 Art Trends and Magical Realism Aesthetics

2024 art trends emphasize "boldness and vibrancy" as "a celebration of individuality and self-expression through art," with styles ranging "from abstract explosions of colour to detailed, vivid scenes". Many modern artists are combining "magical realism with mixed media and expressive styles," with artists like LACE Ruig skillfully mixing "magical realism with expressive styles and various media to create powerful artworks".

### Music and Netflix Adaptation Impact

The 2024 Netflix adaptation of "One Hundred Years of Solitude" has brought renewed attention to the work. The Netflix adaptation features a soundtrack that "combines traditional Colombian sounds with contemporary compositions, creating a sound atmosphere that perfectly complements the series' story".

### Fashion and Aesthetic Trends

Contemporary aesthetic trends include "painterly realism, stylized 3D, neon-soaked cyberpunk, hand-drawn 2D, and AI-enhanced surrealism" dominating creative spaces in 2025. Artists are "experimenting with various techniques and materials" to create work that communicates "the unique touch of originality and humanity".

### Contemporary Artists Working in Magical Realism

Contemporary magical realism artists include figures like Francisco Toledo, "a renowned Mexican Zapotec artist" whose "art often drew upon his Indigenous Zapotec heritage, infusing his creations with mythological and natural elements".

While the search didn't reveal extensive specific content about young TikTok and Instagram artists creating visual interpretations of "One Hundred Years of Solitude," it does show that magical realism aesthetics are experiencing a renaissance in contemporary art, with 2024 marked by bold, expressive styles that blend traditional techniques with modern sensibilities and digital platforms.
